thread.title: BRIEF-Two Harbors Investment Reports Q4 Results

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Two Harbors Investment Reports Q4 Results
text:
Feb 6 (Reuters) - Two Harbors Investment Corp:
* TWO HARBORS INVESTMENT CORP. REPORTS FOURTH QUARTER 2017 FINANCIAL RESULTS
* TWO HARBORS INVESTMENT CORP - QTRLY GAAP NET INCOME PER WEIGHTED AVERAGE BASIC COMMON SHARE $0.88‍​
* TWO HARBORS INVESTMENT CORP - QTRLY CORE EARNINGS PER WEIGHTED AVERAGE BASIC COMMON SHARE $0.47
* TWO HARBORS INVESTMENT CORP - BOOK VALUE PER COMMON SHARE WAS $16.31 AS OF DECEMBER 31, 2017‍​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
